title: Watford striker Jerome Sinclair interesting ADO Den Haag
description: Eredivisie side ADO Den Haag are interested in taking Watford forward Jerome Sinclair on loan, Sky sources understand.
content: Sinclair has started just one Premier League game since his Â£4m move to Vicarage Road from Liverpool 18 months ago.The 21-year-old spent the second half of last season on loan at Birmingham but only managed three starts for the Blues in the Sky Bet Championship.Sky sources understand Watford would allow Sinclair to leave in order to gain regular first-team football.Den Haag are currently seventh in the Dutch Eredivisie and host VVV-Venlo on Saturday.
